competenciasEspecificas: 1. Understand and interpret the general meaning and the most relevant details of texts expressed clearly and in standard language, looking for reliable sources and making use of strategies such as inference of meaning, in order to respond to specific communicative needs (CCL2, CCL3, CP1, CP2, STEM1, CD1, CPSAA5, CCEC2).

2. Produce original texts, of medium length, simple and clearly organised, using strategies such as planning, compensation or self-repair, in order to express relevant messages creatively, appropriately and coherently and respond to specific communicative purposes (CCL1, CP1, CP2, STEM1, CD2, CPSAA5, CE1, CCEC3).

3. Interact with others with increasing autonomy, using cooperative strategies and employing analogue and digital resources, to respond to specific communicative purposes in exchanges respectful of the rules of politeness (CCL5, CP1, CP2, STEM1, CPSAA3, CC3).

4. Mediate in everyday situations between different languages, using simple strategies and knowledge aimed at explaining concepts or simplifying messages, in order to transmit information effectively, clearly and responsibly (CCL5, CP1, CP2, CP3, STEM1, CPSAA1, CPSAA3, CCEC1).

5. Expand and use personal linguistic repertoires between different languages, reflecting critically on their functioning and becoming aware of one's own strategies and knowledge, in order to improve the response to specific communicative needs (CP2, STEM1, CPSAA1, CPSAA5, CD2).

6. Critically evaluate and adapt to linguistic, cultural and artistic diversity from the foreign language, identifying and sharing similarities and differences between languages and cultures, in order to act empathetically and respectfully in intercultural situations (CCL5, CP3, CPSAA1, CPSAA3, CC3, CCEC1).
